name: After-Life
description:
After-Life is a 3rd person 3d-platformer. You just realized that you died... What will you do with this information? Will you find the meaning of life? Follow our main protagonist through various landscapes in his quest on the other side of life! What will you find there? Maybe you will be enlightened...

This is the first video game I worked on. I had to learn coding, modeling, texturing, animation, level design and this is my product! I know the game isn't perfect, but please keep in mind, this is my first attempt at developing a video game. Hopefully you will like my game!

  • If you play this game for the first time, it will take about 1 hour and 30 minutes to beat the game.
  • If you know every corner and run past everything it will take about 30 minutes to finish the game.
  • If you explore everything, collect everything, find all secrets and easter eggs you will complete the game in about 3 hours.

Release: 01/26/2016

Please enjoy and have fun!

Check out my next game:

https://waterfire.itch.io/3d-platformer-prototype
